summary: Beat Takeshi, a prominent actor, meets a lookalike named Kitano, who is a struggling actor, but after the meeting, Kitano's dreams take a violent, surreal turn.
cast: Takeshi Kitano|Kotomi Kyôno|Kayoko Kishimoto|Ren Osugi|Susumu Terajima|Tetsu Watanabe|Akihiro Miwa|Naomasa Musaka|Kôichi Ueda|Tsutomu Takeshige|Junya Takaki|Shôgo Kimura|Kanji Tsuda|Makoto Ashikawa|Tamotsu Ishibashi|Kunihiro Matsumura|Toshi|Shôken Kunimoto|Shinji Uchiyama|D.J. Hanger|Beat Kiyoshi|Taigi Kobayashi|Jonathan Legg|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Takashi Nishina|Zomahoun Rufin|Taichi Saotome|Junya Takagi|Toshiyuki Watarai
keywords: written and directed by cast member|surrealism|yakuza|woman shot|repeated line
title: Takeshis'
